trelloR 0.5.0

    • R API for Trello

R API for Trello

The purpose of trelloR is to easily interact with Trello API from R. It can retrieve, create, update and delete cards, labels, checklists and other data from Trello boards, using functions with predictable names.

The following snippet fetches cards from a public board:

library(trelloR)
board = get_id_board("https://trello.com/b/Pw3EioMM/trellor-r-api-for-trello")
cards = get_board_cards(board)

Private and team boards are accessed with secure token (see Trello developer keys). The CRAN version can only download data, support for PUT, POST and DELETE requests is implemented in the development version (see below).

For more information, check the docs or the vignette.

Get it from CRAN (version 0.1)

install.packages("trelloR")

…or from GitHub (current)

devtools::install_github("jchrom/trelloR")

Note. trelloR is built using Hadley Wickham’s httr and Jeroen Ooms’ jsonlite.

Disclaimer: trelloR is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by or in any way officially connected to Trello, Inc. (http://www.trello.com).
